dataList.content: Hopkins’ face quickly turned into a cold frown.
It was in such stark contrast to the face he showed before Vergilius, I shuddered in fright.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Don’t you know why we bothered to let a fallen Wing’s feather into our Office?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: T—To deal with requests taking place in L Corp. branches more safely…

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Exactly. I didn’t even expect much from a low-rank agent.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Just two simple jobs: lead the way, and tell us how to deal with those Abnormaladies or whatever.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Now look… What do you expect us to do with just “Oh nooo, I’ve never seen those before!” Huh?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Gosh, Hopkins, feeling hangry? Take it easy~
If they are in fact new to Ms. Yuri, then these might be another type of entity derived from Abnormalities… Perhaps a new species.
That Corporation might not have had every specimen in their confines, either.
Yuri, there is no reason to lambaste yourself for neglecting to remember what you were never taught.
What’s there to argue about? All that matters is we beat ‘em to death, right?
Give the word, and we’ll do it.
